text: Nandao ni bu zhidao zhenzhu shi quanzhi tiandi wanwu de ma? Fan yousan geren mitan, ta jiushi di si ge canyu zhe; fan you wu geren mitan, ta jiushi di 408	di wuba zhang biansu zhe (mu cha di lai) liu ge canyu zhe; fan you bi na geng shao huo geng duo de ren mitan, wulun tamen zai nali, ta zong shi yu tamen tong zai de; ranhou zai fuhuo ri, ta yao ba tamen de xing wei gaosu tamen. Zhenzhu que shi quanzhi wanwu de
